creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: rectangle with black borders--wide on sides with nine spaced knotted piping on side edges; coarse embroidered geometric horizontal pattern in magenta, black and blue; center top black bordered, red center with floral pattern, with 4 additional knotted piping
title: Baby Carrier
